markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Enthralling Allure](/Feats.aspx?ID=1341) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Dhampir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=215" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 33 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

The powers of domination employed by your progenitors have manifested in you as well. Once per day, you can cast [_charm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=34) as a 1st-level divine innate spell.
name: Enthralling Allure
